title: Find my phone
summary: Did you ever lose or forget your phone? Then this is the app for you !!!

descriptionHTML:
Did you ever lose or forget your phone?
Then this is the app for you !!!

At disposal you get two unique features:
1) A reminder that you forgot the phone if you leave it;
2) Search for the phone in case you forget where you put it.

All Features:
1. Alarm screen protection by Fingerprint and Lock pattern;
2. Alarm screen tweaking: Ringtone, Sound Volume, Vibration, Flash and Brightness;
3. Disable Home, Back, Volume and other buttons when Alarm screen is active (activate special option);
4. Use simple Notification or Alarm screen on your watch;
5. Watch tweaking: Ringtone (On/Off), Sound Volume, Vibration;
6. “Find my phone” button on the watch.

Now, using our app, you will never lose your phone!)

For using this app, you need:
1) Connect watch to device
2) Install app from Google Play

After this, app is working. If you lose your phone and go out from it about 30-50 meters, Alarm screen will play music.

Notes:
- Have you found mistake in translation? Easy way to fix it: https://goo.gl/k4MM30
- You need to have an Android Wear Watch to be able to use this app.
Huawei Watch, LG Watch, Samsung Gear, Motorola Moto 360 etc.

Help to develop the application further. Share information about it with friends on social networks.
Facebook: facebook.com/makeev.apps
Google+: plus.google.com/+DmitriyMakeev
VKontakte: vk.com/makeev_apps

Do you have any questions? Please contact us at find.phone.app@gmail.com. We long to know your honest opinion and get your feedback.
comments: If you really wanted to make a app. to help us find our phones then that's what you should have done. It's plain ass stupid that you would have to get a phone watch just to use yours app. Your intentions are plain rude try making a new app one that everyone can use without having to buy more equipment
This is the stupidest thing human kind can make(not true) and it is useless you have to buy full version to do enything
What is these it dud not show what my  iPhone is now I can't find my iphone its useless I hate this app
I hated this app. It doesn't even do anything. It's useless. I have no idea why it's rated 3.1 stars. NO IDEA.
What a waste!!!! Does not give any options of putting in the details of what you want to track
This is stupid.. I can't even find my iPhone with this app
recentChanges: Found translation mistakes? Easy way to fix it: https://goo.gl/k4MM30
üåü More protection. Use Fingerprint and Lock pattern to stop Alarm screen.
üåü Added ability to disable Home, Back, Volume and other buttons when Alarm screen is active.
üåü Added ability to play sound on Watch. Watch should support Audio playing.
üåü New option: detect disconnection by Wi-Fi.
